message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I'm offering it to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair deal for both of us but also leaves some room for negotiation if needed. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can positively impact your business.
